title: Close driving distance to DFW & Love Airports, Custom Lighting
posting_body: ['The Georgian', 'The Georgian features lush landscaped grounds, a cascading fountain, and a sparkling swimming pool.', 'WiFi hot spots are at pool side and in the Clubhouse.', 'You will find an apartment home to suit your needs with a choice of five unique one and two bedroom floor plans, each with their own distinctive style.', "Only minutes away you'll find a renowned school system, fine dining, shopping and entertainment.", 'Conveniently located in North Dallas just minutes from the tollway and George Bush Turnpike.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Interested In This Unit?', 'Use this link for more details:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 609 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Custom Lighting', '- High Speed Internet Available', '- Oversized Private Covered Balconies and Patios', '- 2-inch Plantation Blinds', '- Modern Appliances', '- Wood Burning Fireplaces*', '- Outside Storage Area', '- Spacious pantries', '- Large walk-in closets', '- Designer Flooring', '- Full Size Washer/Dryer Connections*', '* Features vary per individual residence', 'Community Amenities', '- Close driving distance to DFW & Love Airports', '- City of Dallas Gold Star Community', '- BBQ and Picnic Areas', '- Internet Hot Spots and WiFi Cafe', '- Minutes to The Shops at Willowbend', '- Custom Designed Resort Style Pool', '- Top Rated Schools', '- Beautifully Landscaped Greenbelt', '- Pet Park with Agility Area', '- Water Volleyball Court', '- Inter LED Lighting', '- Minutes to Plano & Frisco Shopping', '- Pets Welcome', '- Pre-Wired for High Speed Internet and FIOS', '- 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', 'Pet Policy', 'No aggressive breeds; 100 lb.', 'weight limit', '$10 rent per pet', '$250 Deposit/$250 Non-refundable fee per pet', 'Income Requirements:', '3 times the monthly rent.', 'Driving Directions', 'We are located just North of PGBT on Marsh Lane on the East side of the road.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday:9:30AM-5:30PM', 'Tuesday-Friday:9:30AM-5:30PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday:1:00PM-5:00PM', 'The Georgian', '18880 Marsh Ln., Dallas, TX, 75287', 'f9OT0yVf9']
